suspicious_activity.narrative: From February to August 2025, Cindy Clayton engaged in a high volume of transactions totaling over $200,000. Notably, towards the end of this period, she made several large cash transactions inconsistent with her previous behavior. These included a $5,500.55 cash deposit on July 31, 2025, and a $6,933.66 cash deposit on August 2, 2025. This activity appears to be structured to evade BSA reporting requirements.
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning: High volume of transactions with a pattern of large cash transactions towards the end of the log, inconsistent with previous behavior. Indicative of structuring to avoid BSA reporting requirements.
